name: Master Chen Wei
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Heraldic emblem: Master Chen Wei, simple geometry, 2-3 motifs tied to identity, seal/banner/coin variants, vector SVG, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Heraldic emblem for Master Chen Wei.
textPolicy: no words or inscriptions; pure iconography
revised_prompt: Imagine an image in the style of a painterly fantasy collection adhering to the principles of medieval times. Depicted is an underwater scene rich with teals, deep blues, and sea-greens, creating an aquatic fantasy realm. The scene presents an underwater civilization, showcasing various types of dwellings crafted from materials capable of withstanding extreme pressure, and illuminated by beautiful bioluminescent accents. The main focus is on the heraldic emblems, expertly designed by a character named Master Chen Wei. These emblems encompass 2-3 motifs that closely tie to the identity of this civilization. They are presented in different versions that could be stamped on a seal, hung as a banner, or stamped onto coins. All symbols used are meaningful and coherent with no random string of letters or unintelligible symbols. Keep the image in a specified aspect and resolution, ensuring there are no artifacts. Ensure the style is consistent, foregoing modern tech, sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, and bloom glare, maintaining a uniform medieval aestehtic throughout.
